The main objective of this class is to get a basic handling on importing data, merging multiple data frames, and restructuring data frames between wide and long formats.

## Prepare

Before starting this class:

📦 Install `readr`, `dplyr`, `tidyr`, `ggplot2` , `Hmisc` , `RColorBrewer`

Download sample data files:

⬇️ <a href="/data/class_2_cog_data.csv" download="class_2_cog_data.csv">class_2_cog_data.csv</a>

⬇️ <a href="/data/class_2_mood_data.txt" download="class_2_mood_data.txt">class_2_mood_data.txt</a>

## Outline

-   Import: `readr`

    -   File paths

    -   `read_csv()` and `read_delim()`

-   Merge: `dplyr`

    -   `bind_()` functions

    -   `join_()` functions

-   Restructure: `tidyr`

    -   `pivot_wider()`

    -   `pivot_longer()`
